TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Relatively few cancer cells have spread throughout the body. There may be no symptoms of disease.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage I multiple myeloma"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "estadio I del mieloma múltiple"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Se han diseminado relativamente pocas células cancerosas por todo el cuerpo. Puede no haber síntomas de enfermedad.
